title: New: Draper – On You (feat. Alby Hobbs)
body:
_On You_, the new track from French born, British based producer **Draper** is the first taste of his forthcoming album and if it’s any sign of what to expect, then we’re in for a treat.

Electronics ebb and flow throughout, it’s inescapable groove providing the perfect backing for the evocatively soulful vocals of Hobbs. Turn this one up and let it drift you through the rest of the week. Check it below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
